Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/103rd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 100th and Commercial : due to, street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Torrence, 100th, Commercial and over regular route, due to street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at at Jackson/Kolmar.
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jackson, Kostner, Harrison, Cicero, due to fire department activity near Jackson/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jackson, Kostner, Harrison, Cicero, then resume their normal route on Jackson, due to fire department activity near Jackson/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.
